meanings.sent1: The sculped statue looked beautiful in the park.
meanings.sent2: The artist displayed her sculped masterpiece at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The sculped design on the cake made it too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her sculped hair resembled a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The sculped details on the building facade were intricate and impressive.

meanings.definition: To create or shape by carving or sculpting
meanings.sent1: She sculped a lovely vase out of clay in her pottery class.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor sculped a magnificent sculpture out of marble.
meanings.sent3: He sculped a funny face on the pumpkin for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: The artist sculped the landscape with skill and precision.
meanings.sent5: They sculped a beautiful garden out of the overgrown yard.
